meanings.definition: Scaleups: businesses that have achieved significant growth in a short period of time.
meanings.sent1: Many scaleups in the tech industry have quickly expanded their operations.
meanings.sent2: Investors are always on the lookout for promising scaleups to support.
meanings.sent3: The scaleups at the networking event were growing so fast, it was hard to keep up!
meanings.sent4: The scaleups in the market were like shooting stars, rising rapidly and shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The success of scaleups is like a rocket taking off, reaching new heights in no time.

meanings.definition: Scaleups: the act of increasing the size or scope of a business rapidly.
meanings.sent1: The scaleups of these companies have led to impressive profits.
meanings.sent2: Effective scaleups require careful planning and execution.
meanings.sent3: Watching the scaleups of the small bakery was like witnessing a magic trick!
meanings.sent4: The scaleups of the business were like a balloon expanding quickly, ready to soar.
meanings.sent5: The concept of scaleups is like a wave of growth sweeping through the business world.
